column10: a few dollops of gran luchito tomatillo salsa
column12: 2 tsp dried fenugreek leaves, soaked in 1 tsp hot water
column30: chilli oil (we use lee kum kee)
column31: a casserole pot / ovenproof saucepan with lid
column32: a razor / a very sharp knife
column43: 2x250g pouches of tilda coconut, chilli & lemongrass cooked rice
column59: eggs (we use british lion because they guarantee the highest standards of food safety)
column60: white wine vinegar or lemon juice
column61: empty 330ml or 440ml can — either will work, but smaller cans balance best
column69: vanilla extract or 1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped
column86: plant based mince (we use meatless farm)
column98: red chillis (deseed for a milder heat)
column103: hirata buns (easy to buy at morrisons or sainsbury’s frozen section)
column104: chocolate of your choice for topping
